page.title: 11Penygloddfa School
page.content: In Penygloddfa C.P. School the Infants work in a modern building which has underfloor heating and high ceilings and block walls.The nursery class is in a Victorian building and they have sheds where they store their toys.The Juniors work in very old buildings which are very cold in winter.There are two staff rooms,cloak_rooms, toilets,store_rooms,a music and T.V. room,an assembly hall where we do P.E. and have our lunch,and about 12 class_rooms.We have a teacher who helps children with their reading and English,and a teacher who teaches Welsh.We have a musical teacher who teaches all instruments.Sometimes we have students from Aberystwyth University as part of their training. We take part in the Urdd Eisteddfod every year.We have 3 B.B.C. computers and five television sets.
